tool.name: Dataset Exporter
tool.description: - transfer datasets to the network shares
tool.command:
#set is_admin = $__user_email__ in $__admin_users__ python '$__tool_directory__/dataset_export.py' --email '$__user_email__' --username '$__user_name__' #for $d in $datasets #set tags = ','.join(str(t.value) for t in $d.tags) --dataset '${d}' --dataset_name '${d.element_identifier}' --dataset_extension '${d.ext}' --dataset_tags '${tags}' --history_id '${d.hid}' --history_name '${d.dataset.history.name}' #end for
#if str( $options.selection_mode ) == "defaults": --file_pattern '${options.predefined_file_pattern}' #else: --file_pattern '${options.file_pattern}' #end if --log '$log' #if $is_admin: --skip_user_permission_check #end if #if $dry_run: --dry_run #end if

param.name: file_pattern
param.label: File pattern (see below for placeholders}
param.help: Where the file needs to placed and how the name should be constructed.

param.name: dry_run
param.label: Only do a dry run
param.help: No directories will be created or files written! Very useful to find the right pattern!

tool.help:
help_macro
**File Pattern** Available placeholders are:
- {username}: your username - {email}: your email address - {group}: your **primary** unix group - {id}: Dataset id - {name}: Dataset name - {ext}: Dataset extension (e.g. bam, fa) - {history}: history name - {tags}: all tags on the dataset seperated by a dash e.g. myfasta_tag1-tag2.fa - {hid}: Galaxy history id
E.g. "/g/{group}/{username}/{history}/{name}_{tags}.{ext}" will become: "/g/gbcs/scholtal/My_History/myfasta_tag1-tag2.fa"
**Note:** File paths cannot contain any whitespaces, they will be converted to underscores(_)
